metadata.title: CVE-2018-11710 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: soundlib/pattern.h in libopenmpt before 0.3.9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted AMS file because of an invalid write near address 0 in an out-of-memory situation. It was discovered that OpenMPT incorrectly handled certain files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: libopenmpt package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9-1').
